verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Saviour's precious blood
Has made all nations one.
United let us praise this deed
The Father's love has done.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In this vast world of men,
A world so full of sin,
No other theme can be our prayer
Than this: your kingdom come!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In this sad world of war
Can peace be ever found?
Unless the love of Christ prevail,
True peace will not abound.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Master's new command
Was: love each other well!
O brothers, let us all unite
To do his holy will.
